attributes.action: acknowledge that Global Warming is NOT caused by increased CO2 in the atmosphere
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Global Warming is caused by Solar activity. The increase in CO2 FOLLOWS rather than PRECEDES increase in temperature. The current hysteria about greenhouse gases being caused by industry is promoted by the CO2 Industry and is diverting attention from dealing with the real problems of global warming.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
